nodes.long_description:
Discover a new world of music with HyperSpace Music, the ultimate VR app for Oculus headsets. HyperSpace Music revolutionizes your auditory experience by transforming your favorite MP3 tracks into breathtaking visual masterpieces.

Simply load your MP3 files into the default "music" folder on your headset, and let HyperSpace Music do the rest. Each song is brought to life through stunning, real-time visualizers that respond dynamically to the beats, rhythms, and melodies of your music. Whether you're grooving to pop, rocking out to metal, or relaxing with classical tunes, HyperSpace Music creates an immersive visual landscape that complements every genre.

Dive into a vibrant universe where sound and sight merge, offering an unparalleled sensory adventure. Customize your experience with various visual themes and effects, ensuring that no two journeys are ever the same. HyperSpace Music is perfect for music lovers, VR enthusiasts, and anyone looking to elevate their listening experience.

App Created by Krish T / Vicente M / Violet / Hemal B - Future Productions Films
Video Backgrounds - Björn Richter & TellSoto
Space Cover Art - Photo by Felix Mittermeier

LINKS:
http://www.future-productions.co.uk
https://dietechrecruiter.de/author/bj%C3%B6rn-richter/ 
https://www.pexels.com/photo/blue-universe-956981/
nodes.short_description: HyperSpace Music is a VR app for Oculus headsets that lets you discover a new world of music through stunning visualizers. Load your favorite MP3 tracks into the music folder on your headset, and watch as HyperSpace Music transforms each song into an immersive visual experience, with vibrant, dynamic landscapes reacting in real-time to the beats and rhythms of your music.

nodes.change_log:
Hyperspace Music – Version 1.1.9 Release Notes

We’ve been working hard to bring you exciting new updates for Hyperspace Music—enhancing both audio and visuals for an even more immersive journey. 

Here’s what’s new:

New Features & Improvements

Tracklist Under B Button
A major upgrade. You can now access a new tracklist UI under the B button, giving you a streamlined and intuitive way to explore your MP3 music library in VR.

Cinematic Film Effects
Enhanced visual effects bring a more immersive, cinematic experience. These effects are still being refined, but they already elevate the way you experience Hyperspace Music.

Autopilot Mode
Let AI pilot your starfighter in scene 2 giving you the freedom to multitask while enjoying the visuals and music.

Sideload Android Apps
Boost your productivity and creativity by running 2D Android apps alongside Hyperspace Music, unlocking new possibilities while exploring the VR universe.

Audio Enhancements & Fixes
Persistent Music Playback
Your music now plays seamlessly across all scenes—no more interruptions when navigating menus or toggling UI elements.

Smooth Track Transitions
Autoplay Next Track – No more silence at the end of a song. Tracks now automatically flow into the next one.

Improved Skip & Previous Buttons – Skip and rewind now function logically, remembering both the last played track and keeping history intact.

Stop Button Fix – The stop button no longer skips tracks and correctly halts playback.

New Volume Control
A volume slider has been added to the Options Menu, allowing for quick and precise audio adjustments directly from the UI. Perfect for mixing audio when multitasking.

Scrubbing Bar Fixed
The progress bar no longer freezes when skipping through a track.
Scrubbing now accurately updates the remaining time and progress in real time.

Visual & Performance Enhancements
Improved Starfighter Animations
Starfighters fly in tighter formations with smoother animations.
Thrusters and flames have more detail and dynamic effects, adding to your journey through sound.

Hyperspace Window Layer
A new depth-enhancing layer has been added, making hyperspace jumps feel more realistic.

Cinematic Color Correction
Subtle enhancements bring deeper contrasts and richer visuals across different scenes.

General Bug Fixes & Performance Tweaks
More stable music playback in background mode.
Options Menu stays active in the background, ensuring track transitions always function.

Optimized for Meta Quest, reducing lag and improving visual performance.

What’s Next?
Future updates will focus on:

More visual customization options for hyperspace aesthetics.
Improved playlist management for easier track selection.
Expanded file format support beyond MP3s, ensuring better compatibility.

Join the Journey
We’d love to hear from you. If you enjoy the update, leave a review, share your feedback, or tag us in your Hyperspace Music VR experience.

Follow for updates: @future__vr
Customer Support or Questions: hello@future-productions.co.uk

What’s New in This Update? - 1.1.8

MAJOR BUGFIX: NOW MUSIC WILL CONTINUE TO FLOW EVEN WHEN MULTITASKING!

Infinite Audio Flow – Your music now glides seamlessly through hyperspace. Tracks transition smoothly, always keeping you in motion. No pauses. No silence. Just endless beats.

New Volume Control – Take command of your audio environment with an intuitive volume slider inside the Options Menu. Tune in or drift into ambient bliss. This slider is perfect for mixing levels if you are using other apps on top or multi-tasking.


Enhanced Scrubbing & Track Management – Navigate through tracks effortlessly, with fluid scrubbing and countdown timers that sync in real time.

NEW TRACKLIST: Check it out under the B button Menu, cue a track on demand!

The Journey Continues…

Hyperspace Music is an ever-evolving experience, taking you across galaxies of sound and vision. Whether you’re floating through a nebula of beats or warping through starfields of color, this update ensures your voyage is memorable.

Fire up your headset. Select your sound. Enter Hyperspace.

Hyperspace Music - Version 1.1.6
Release Notes

We’ve been working hard to bring you some exciting new updates for Hyperspace Music. Here's what's new:

New Features:

New Tracklist Under B Button: A major update! You can now access a new tracklist under the B button, giving you a more intuitive and streamlined way to explore your MP3 music library.

Cinematic Film Effects: Experience enhanced visual effects that elevate your immersion. These are still being refined for future updates, but they already add a cinematic touch to your journey.

Autopilot Mode: Fly your starfighter with AI as your companion, giving you the freedom to multitask while enjoying the visual experience.

Sideload Android Apps: Boost your productivity by sideloading a variety of 2D Android apps while enjoying the Hyperspace Music universe.

Visual Enhancements:
Improved Starfighter Animations: Starfighters now fly in tighter formations, with more detailed animations and dynamic effects like thrusters and flames.

Hyperspace Window Layer: A new layer has been added to enhance the visual depth and realism of your hyperspace experience.

Cinematic Color Correction: Subtle color adjustments have been made to the scenes for a more polished look.

General Updates:
Persistent Music: Music now plays seamlessly across all scenes, enhancing the overall flow of the app.

Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements: We've made several under-the-hood improvements to ensure a smoother, more stable experience.

Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to refine and expand Hyperspace Music!

Hyperspace Music v1.1.6 is Here! 

Just when you thought it couldn’t get any better... it did!

New Cinematic Film Effects:

We’ve added stunning cinematic effects to enhance your cosmic journey. These are just the beginning—more tweaks and improvements are coming in future updates!

(Previous Update v1.1.5 Recap)

Smoother Starfighter Animations:

Ships glide more fluidly than ever, with improved animations and even more enhancements on the way.

10 Visualizer Scenes:

Explore 10 mesmerizing scenes, perfectly synced to your music.

UI Upgrades:

Access the menu with both A and B buttons.
The menu now drifts smoothly as you look around.

DOWNLOAD NOW!

- Credit Update -

App Created by Krish T & Vicente M - Future Productions Films
UI & Additional Development by Hemal B 
Video Backgrounds - Björn R & TellSoto

Dear Hyperspace Travelers,

Your journey just got smoother and more spectacular! 

What’s New in v1.1.5?

Starfighter Enhancements: Fighter ships now feature smoother movements and upgraded animations, with even more improvements coming in the next update.

Scene Smoothness: We’ve added enhanced fluidity across all visual scenes, making your hyperspace experience more immersive than ever.

UI Upgrades:
The menu is now accessible with both the A and B buttons for easier navigation.

The UI menu drifts gracefully as you look around, blending seamlessly into the experience.

10 Visualizer Scenes: Explore 10 unique visualizer scenes, each offering a stunning journey synced to your music.

Thank you for flying with Hyperspace Music. Keep exploring, stay strong, and let the stars be your guide! 

- The Hyperspace Music Team
